content.detailedDescription:
About 10:30-10:33 pm east daylight time:
 i do a lot of binocular astronomy from my backyard, and my wife and i had just looked at jupiter to the south. as we walked back toward our house i looked up and pointed out 2 "star"like objects noticeably moving east. cassiopeia, and ursa major were visible, but not as bright due to hazy, sporadic clouds; one white light was lower and right of the other (my crude description would be they were about 3 inches apart; they stayed in same position as they traveled in northern part of sky west to east. at a casual glance they would have looked like stars. through 12-50 binoculars they looked exactly the same; no strobes or color, and no sound. no details were visible even with binoculars; just 2 moderately bright white lights, moving steadily east. viewing lasted 4-5 minutes, and my wife was with me. i went in and checked the time after the sighting and it was 10:39 pm.
 i see many silent aircraft flights at night, and figure a lot is "homeland security" air patrols; this was nothing like high flying jets with their lights and strobes visible! camp atterbury army base, edinburgh, in is quite close, plus crane naval surface warfare center is in southern indiana, and wright-patterson is to the northeast. our thoughts were some type of military flight, but it did not look like the usual ones we see nightly. 
 we watched this until the object/objects went from view still heading due east. shelbyville, in is between indianapolis and cincinnati by i-74, ind st. rd 9, and ind. st. rd. 44.
_____________________________________________________________________________
  .


       
         
             .
_____________________________________________________________________________
relative position of the 2 white light objects
content.summary: In hazy sky, 2 star like objects traveled west to east

content.detailedDescription:
My duaghter and i where cooling off in the pool in the backyard before we where going to go to bed. from the west i noticed then asked her to look as well at two moving lights that where moving from west to east. the lights where to far from each other to be a single plane and it appeared to move to fast to be a blimp (the lights where to far apart even for a blimp.) as it moved closer i could just make out a outline of the front of the object. the front was about 20% longer than the distance between the set of two lights. i could not hear any sound from it over the highway in the distance. it continued to fly in a striaght path as it flew over fort wayne and the light became dimmer the just disappeared as it appeared to cross over 69.
i asked my daughter and i tried as well to verify that stars disappeared as it came between them and our viewpoint. she and i both saw the stars disappear momentarly as it passed on one side of the object. so it appeared to be one solid object. if i was to guess it was flying at about 4000 ft high and appeared to be 500 feet long and maybe 60 feet wide. i wear glasses and my daughter dose not. it maybe was traveling 150 mph. pretty slow for two jets chasing each other. (seeing two or more millitary jets is a common sight around fort wayne)the lights did not flash and were a slight golden white the one closest to us as it traved from the west to east was brighter and more golden in color. this was true even as it passed us and continued to travel east. i asked my daughter not to mention this to her mother because i already know she thinks i am crazy. i was glad my daughter was able to see something herself she could not easily explain. she has been tring very hard to not believe the so called crazies of the world when they say they have seen something.
content.summary: Two light appeared to chase each other in a striaght line traveling at the same speed.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my front porch that faces the west getting a breath of fresh air and noticed two dim lights in the sky to the northwest moving to the southeast.  at first i thought they were two stars that were very close together.  i thought that strange because i never noticed stars in that position that close together before.  i looked down for about ten seconds looked up again and noticed the lights were getting brighter and getting closer to my position.  the lights were in perfect unison in both speed and relative position to each other.  there was absolutly no sound and there were no blinking navigation lights as an aircraft would have.  they appeared to be relativly low, perhaps 500-1000 feet in elevation and the lights themselves appeared elongated, not circular in shape.  their airspeed appeared to be approximately 75-100 mph if the elevation is correct. within 20 seconds after they passed overhead, the lights faded out which i found odd since they were visible for so long earlier as they approached. the night was clear with no cloud cover.  the sighting was observed by my wife and my eleven year old daughter.
content.summary: Two bright lights moving slowly across the sky in perfect unison from northesat to southwest.

content.detailedDescription: Tonight is a very clear night, and i was outside getting something from my car. i looked up at the sky to see if i could see anything that might resemble the atlantis shuttle (it is on its way home this evening).  i noticed two white lights around 9:34pm (central) which were moving from west to east in the distance over our back field. they were moving at a fairly fast pace, although i have no idea what their altitude was. they retained the same distance from each other, and eventually faded off into the distance beneath a low-lying cloud. i brought my family outside to see the lights, because they seemed very differnt from the obvious planes that were also in the sky.  there were no flashing red lights - only the constant white light.  martin county is very close the crane naval base, so we thought it may be military aircraft, but the constant distance between the two lights seemed too precise.  maybe it was related to the iss or atlantis, afterall - i don't know much about them??
content.summary: Moving lights

content.detailedDescription: This afternoon i stopped by our store on maple grove street 2 blocks north of overland rd. in boise.  i had pulled the truck around back to unload some stuff, went in the store, did my thing and then exited the rear of the building.  my work buddy followed me out and i walked around back of the truck to check if the back was closed.  as i looked up in the sky while talking with my friend i noticed the crescent moon.  i also noticed something that looked like a star about 2-3 degrees in the 4 o'clock position to the moon.  i told my buddy about today's picture on spaceweather.Com that shows a daytime photo of the crescent moon and venus.  i thought i was actually seeing venus up there, but as i continued to look at it, the object started to move slowly to the south southeast. it moved slower than a hight flying pasenger jet.  i pointed it out to my buddy and he commented that he didn't know what it was.  i didn't either.  he went inside to get back to work and i stared at it a few more minutes.  it seemed to pulsate or throb with light.  i watched it pass in front of some cirrus clouds and it was still visible against the white background.  i kept waithing for it to do something weird that would verify that it was not a terrestrial vehicle, but it just slowly moved in the same direction, but it did curve more easterly after a minute or so.  since it didn't do anything crazy i figured that i needed to get back to work, so i hoped in my truck and pulled around the building and onto maple grove.  by the time i pulled around the object was lost from my sight.  it did not follow any of the typical flight patterns of the airport that i have witnessed, so i don't know exactly what it was other than a throbing light in the sky that didn't move at the same speed as a high flying passenger jet.  i took three pictures of it with my cell phone, but i don't know how to get them off of it to see if the object is even visible.
content.summary: Star like object moved slowly in a south southeasterly direction below cirrus clouds.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i walked out onto our porch about 5:47 pm, i looked up and saw a bright white ball hovering. i asked my husband to look and keep his eyes on it while i got the video camera and tripod. we called the kids to look and had them get their aunt and uncle outside to look. 7 witnesses all together. it was to the east (the 70 degree mark on the compass) and about 75 degrees up. it hovered and kind of stretched like it was going to change shape and after about 4 minutes it faded or blinked out and we couldn���t see it with our eyes any longer. when we watched it on tv later, we saw that it was still there but not bright and hard to see. the weather was warm, upper 80's, no clouds in the immediate area, winds coming from the west. i will put the video on disc and mail it in because the file is going to be really big.
content.summary: White ball of light hovering then faded out

content.detailedDescription:
The object appeared very long, in fact incredibly long, one bright smaller white round or oval  light on top, in between darkness, bottom of the object or staff/pole shaped, a very large round light moving very fast, if they were not connected it was in unison. these lights were brighter than any star, the night was clear with very few clouds. the object(s) were silent and moving easterly, there were aircraft in the area to the right of the object(at a distance), the aircraft in question definitely saw the lights. it made the jet look like it was not moving and with the lights from the plane it was easy to distinguish the unidentified object. the pilot had to report this to gerald r ford airport without question. the object(s) moved in together then shot straight up through a cloud and the lights fainted.  it was the most bizarre thing i have ever seen.
1) i was letting the dogs out on my back deck
2) the very bright lights and how the objects or object was traveling. very fast
3)  no idea what the object was, the plane off in the distance made a great comparison or example to this "thing".
4) long small round or oval light on top, on bottom very large intese round light
5) uneasiness after watching the plane on my right and this object on left
6)the object shot up through the small cloud and then shot straight up and was gone.
content.summary: I was outside on my deck and saw a strange very large object

content.detailedDescription:
I was looking out of a kitchen window whilst making coffee, from the window i can see for miles around as there isnt much but feilds in the area untill it comes to a road which crosses the whole of the horizon right off in the distance (you can see the street lights illuminating the road)

i noticed a reddish light way off in the distance, it was low on the horizon but definately in the sky and staying in the same position.I didnt think much of it other than the fact that i've never seen anything in that position before.I kept looking at it for a few minutes just to check if it was a plane or to try figure out what it was because it was unusually low on the horizon.The light started twinkling after about a minute and then after perhaps another minute all of a sudden the light faded out.It was like the light had just been "turned off".I thought this unusual as obviously a star can't do this and nor can planets.

after about 5 minutes i went back to the window to see if the light had returned and off in the distance i saw what i assumed to be a helicopter taking off from an airbase which is visible to me from the same window.The helicopter proceeded to go in the direction where the light had vanished from.
the helicopter went past where the light was and then went around it and returned to it's base.

if the light had of still been there the helicopter would of come close to the light but the light had already gone by the time the helicopter took off.

i didnt get a pic as it dissapeared quickly.It just looked like a reddish star off in the far distance which stayed in the same position in the sky but winked out after a short time.

the helicopter is the most interesting part of the story i feel.The weather was calm and clear and there were no clouds in sight.
content.summary: Distant reddish light which hovered but "winked out", helicopters checked area afterwards

content.detailedDescription: As i was watching the sky on sunday evening, i noticed a very bright light moving from the south to the north this was to high to be a plane (no strobes visible)and to low to be a satellite and was very bright, i called for my daughter-in-law too come and see.She ran out and saw the light moving through the sky(she is 23 years old)and very,very fast!We noticed it began to slow down, then it stopped! we could not believe our eyes! it stopped! the light began too dim, then it was gone! it blended in with the rest of the stars! this ended up at the handle of the big dipper. i don't know if it's just a coincidence but some-one witnessed a similar event in colorado,the same night,and posted it on this web-site ,how strange.I witnessed this whole episode with my binoculars.Believe me you can see a lot more with binoculars than you can by your naked eye.
content.summary: Not a satellite !

content.detailedDescription:
Friends,
the exact time i cannot remember.  i was nine years old at the time.  all i know is that it was in the fall/winter of '89.  my mother, my two year old brother and i were returning home from my brother's god-parents house on 14th street.  we lived at that time in caballo street.  caballo used to be the last street in that sub-division, with only a about 15 homes built.  our home was right in front off where the empty lots started.  just to give you a mental picture of the location. picture this:
from mary lou drive turn right onto caballo.(like i said before caballo was the last street. windlake loop did not exist nor did alambre dr. these streets were barren lots.) our home about the 7th one on the right side of the street.  in front of the house there were no homes yet, just barren land as far as the eye could see.  as we approached the house my mother, about to pull the cadillac into the garage, asks me if i was seeing what she was seeing.  to the left of us(in front of the house)over the empty lots and about 50 feet up and maybe 100 yards away from us is some kind of craft. all we could see were two illuminated squares that appeared to be windows, and red lights next to them. just hovering!  our first reaction was to think, border patrol helicopter.  my mom rolled down the window, no sound!  my mom turned to look at me with disbelief.  we turned our attention back to the craft and it seemed to turn over on its belly.  like flipping a tortilla over you know?  we opened the doors and stepped outside to see if we could hear a noise. nothing.  all of a sudden the craft started to move slowly to the left of us(back to the direction of mary lou dr.)  we got into the car and turned it around to follow it side by side.  the craft was now about 50 yards behind the houses.  when we, the craft and us, got to the end of caballo st. the craft flew over to what is now windlake loop and seemed to land.  we slowly drove along mary lou dr. to see if we could see and or hear anything.  after a couple of minutes my mom said "ok, this is strange.  its gone, lets go home and we'll tell your father tomorrow."  we got home, my mom pulled the car into the driveway.  we got out to open the garage.  we did not have and electric door.  it was manual.  as soon as we got out of the car. my mom screams, "look its back!"  she a was pointing towards the start of the block.  the craft all of a sudden shines a bright white light on us.  the front of the house seemed like it was day light.  we just stood there mesmerized just looking into the light just thinking why is there no sound on this damn thing.  after what seemed a couple minutes, it turned off the light. in a blink of an eye it jetted upward and disappeared.  we stood there, my mom had here jaw at the floor.  "did you see that?"  of course!  when we went to bed i kept imagining an alien peeking in through the windows. needless to say i slept in my parents bed that night.
over the course of the next few days, my father a doctor, returned from the hospital with a weird contraption.  it was a little yellow box with a handle and a little sliver prod connected by a cord.  the yellow box had a gauge.  my dad said it was a radiation detector.  a friend that worked at the hospital lent it to him.  we went to were we thought it had landed.  nothing, no radiation.  i was upset because i know we had seen something a few days back.  after all these years i still don't know what the hell that was and i want answers.  i have never done drugs, physically fit, good mental health.  you see it does not end there with my family.  after this happened my parents told me a story that years before i was born.  they too had seen something that seemed to be flying next to them as they traveled down the dark highway.  fast forward to early 90's and once again my mom and myself saw weird craft where we live in pepper lane.  
thank you for taking the time to read this.  if anyone in the del rio area has seen something similar please let me know.

sincerley,
a friend
content.summary: Ufo encounter in del rio

content.detailedDescription:
It was a relatively clear saturday afternoon, my girlfriend and i were at the local high school ( san pasqual high ) getting ready to jog on their track. we were on top of the hill that overlooks the stadium when we saw a bright star-like object approach from the east. as it came closer its shape became more apparent, more boomerang shaped but very smooth. the top side was made of what appeared to be a highly reflective gold colored metal. the bottom of the object was the color of dull bronze and didn't really seem to reflect the light. 
i had my backpack with me and luckily inside it was my camera, so in haste i quickly retrieved my camera and ran closer to the object. it made absolutely no sound and it initially moved very slowly. too slow for an airplane to fly.
as it approached us the object banked to the north and after about 30 seconds  reversed it's direction revealing it's side to us.
we watched if for some time as it banked back and forth, then all of a sudden it tipped it's nose to about a 45 degree angle and quickly ascended out of sight. it was completely out of sight after about three seconds. 
i wasn't afraid when i saw the object, just fascinated by it's erratic movements and it's beauty. it truly was a beautiful thing to behold.
content.summary: Boomerang shaped ufo

content.detailedDescription:
I have photographed more "unknowns" over my home the past couple of months. i uploaded almost 50 new photos, from may & june, of some interesting "objects" at my home. the most recent, are in my photobucket album.....On pages 1 thru' 3....Though i have 9 pages uploaded to date. 

the actual dates & times are on the copies of the originals of each photo...Located in their lower right hand corners. 

i uploaded cropped, as well as auto-enhanced copies of each original as well, so you can see the objects in detail. 

what i find very interesting, is that it appears to be either the same object (or like objects) appearing on these different dates & times. when i am taking photos, i will see a very large shadowy darkness pass overhead, as well as brilliant flashes of light in the sky. 

i now have 159 photos, as well as 5 videos and 1 slideshow added, and i will be adding more to my photobucket album, as time allows. 

i have included cropped and auto-enhanced copies of the original photos here, in my photobucket album: 

http://s116.Photobucket.Com/albums/o31/mufonstarchild/ 

(copy & paste the above link into your searchbar) 

patty d 
mufon intl & michigan mufon 
field investigator
content.summary: I am a mufon fi....Many unknowns photographed over my home...

content.detailedDescription:
A few days ago it was reported there was a ring around the sun.  searching this out on the net i found this was not the first instance as they have been seeing this for a few years in various areas.
i realized a star when it becomes unstable and dying will exhibit these same attributes.  it will also emit nebulae which will appear red and blue. our sun is a medium size star.  i copied the following as this isn���t supposed to happen for 10,000 years.  but reading stories and viewing the many pictures on mufon it appears to be happening now.
accordingly this is what i copied from the net: as we viewed our home galaxy, the milky way, we would see these "planetary", or ejection nebulae flaring and fading all the time, about one per earth year, much as the flashes of cameras at a sports stadium at night. at any given instant more than 10,000 nebulae are visible in some stage of their evolution.
planetary nebulae make the milky way come alive. from afar the milky way would resemble a scintillating galactic christmas tree. a red flash appears here, and another there, as planetary nebulae form. for a few thousand years each nebula brightens and turns from red to green.
thanks, bonnie bell    
www.Welcome2armageddon.Com/
content.summary: In response to: way brighter and bigger than venus! star-like, but way too big to be a satellite moving.  are we seeing nebuae?

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend were sitting on a stair railing at the beach in porthcawl (south wales, uk) watching the waves out at sea while it started to get dark, i looked up and i could see a bright light coming over from the far distance, heading towards the sea remaining at similar height, (was flying about helicopter height), at first i thought it was a helicopter but as it came nearer the light got really, really bright and the shape became bigger, my friend was seing exactly the same as me, it was travelling really slow and something was like travelling just behind it then all of a sudden it zoomed really high in a diaganol direction and just stayed in the sky like a star, we just couldn't believe what we had saw, it made no noise and we tried taking pictures of it but it was so small in the sky it just looked like a tiny star. we hung around a bit and we were both shaken up, we rang family and friends etc, some made a joke about it and some believed us but you just had to be there to witness it. it just stayed there then almost all night until we went home.
content.summary: It was too bright to see the shape

content.detailedDescription:
Okay, now this is almost embarrassing to tell.  after reporting a ufo event a week ago, my boyfriend, his daughter, and i were out on my deck (3 12 ft stories high) looking in the sky talking about the degrees of the angle my bf's daughter saw the ufo, which was a blue bright light...Along comes a new siting!  we were pointing to venus and talking about the area and angle the other ufo was seen when we looked away for a minute at airplanes in the distance flashing going into pdx in their normal flightpath, when we looked up overhead again.  there in the sky was a huge bright light bigger and brighter than venus by about double.  it was 10:22pm, because we looked at the clock this time!  my bf and i were alone watching this really bright light moving from the west heading southeast high in the sky and we yelled to his daughter to come quickly and look!  she was across the house and came running and it was still in the sky very bright and still moving.  it was way to bright to be a satellite.  no flashing lights, no colored lights and at 10:22pm it was good and dark outside and lots of stars and airplanes were out.  this thing was huge, and it moved across the sky like a satellite, but it was brighter than anything in the sky and venus was very visible.  it just kept heading southeasterly until it was completely out of sight.  it seemed like it was high in the sky, because shortly after that a real satellite passed over and it was a speck in comparison and about a 32nd as bright as venus.  this thing all three of us saw had no tail, trail, smoke, sound, or colored lights.  we weren't really sure if it's path was all that straight.
it was just one big bright light like a double sized venus or more, and it just kept a steady nice speed across the night sky, but we thought it wobbled a little bit at one point.  we all 3 saw it.  we are all disgusted at some of the ridiculous reports that are here on mufon that make the rest of us look like crazy lunatics.  what is with all the lame reports like coming out of bars seeing things, and things coming out of tv sets and killing kids?  why publish this junk???  come on people, if you want to report a ufo...Make it worth all our time and tell the truth or get your head examined.  the truth is out there...Look up, not at your tv tube or while you're stumbling out of a bar!  oh, we tried to take a picture of this thing, but all we got was the movement of the light that made it look like a smoke or rocket explosion with a star in the background.  the star was still, the thing that was moving blurred.  i'll enclose it anyway.
content.summary: Way brighter and bigger than venus! star-like, but way too big to be a satellite moving.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking my dogs out, at around 10:10pm, this monday, june 18th, 2007. i walked down towards the old folks retirement home, as there is a fence where i can let the dogs loose to run, and have some fun for a few minutes. while walking around with them, i noticed, the moon in crescent form, and the two thirds of it were a black disc, with the crescent moon lit up nicely. now, positioned down from the moon, and out a few degrees, was another object, very bright in the evening sky, and i attribute this to being one of our local planets. it is as bright as a football stadium light, with all the other stars shining out more like a small flashlight. 

i turned to the dogs to pet them, then i looked up, and once again, thanked god for bringing any astro beings traveling who would like to say hello, to stop on by, or to make themselves known in their travels here to earth and on by. i looked up, as something caught my eye from by the crescent moon, and down at about the same position as the bright shining planet i just described, and noticed another light, moving across the sky, heading right for me directly. it seemed to sway to the left and then to the right on it's straight line, on an easterly journey. by now it is 10:10pm or 10:25pm. it was about on top if me. now i was in a very quiet spot, and could hear nothing at all. not a whisper of noise, no engine, no prop no small aircraft noise, no green and red navigational light. all i saw were a set of two or three bright lights in the middle, shining down, and the flicker of lights running around the rim, as if it were round. i stopped, waived at it, and tried to take a cell phone picture, but i could not find a way to capture it on my cell phone camera. i tried to find it several times, but i could not find a light in my camera lenses at all. just black sky.

it was at this time, i looked up at it, as it had move quite a distance by now, probably half way from here (tanasbourne area, to downtown portland), and it just went black, as it never existed before. i thought it might be the new space station, but no way, this was a lot lower than that. i would say maybe traveling around 30k feet or so. it flew right over me, stopped for a moment, then slowly proceeded on. when i looked at my watched, i noticed about 20 more minutes went by, and the dogs were much further apart than they should have been. i never let them out of my sight, i had to corral them back to me. they did not want to come near me for some reason. but they did. then i kept trying to piece together the time. it wasn't a lot of time, but that much time had not gone by. i called my partner to tell him about it. here we go again.  ok so that was cool. i would love to hear from you again if ok.
content.summary: Diamond shaped object, lots of lights, no noise at all, then dissappears

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my dog out to do her business and looked up in the sky at the beautiful night when i saw a very pronounced extremely bright red sphere high in the sky.  at first thought i believed it to be a satellite as many fly over the area.  however, as i watched this sphere it zig zagged two distinct times in its flight path in a very pronounced way.  it almost was as a blip on a heart beat monitor, but obviously not exactly.  i called to my wife who also observed the red sphere and the zig zagging pattern in its flight path.  this is the third sighting of an anomaly this year.  as it went to the east-south-east it phased out like a satellite would if it lost reflection but since this thing zig zagged in its flight path i have no explanation.  it flew in a linear path, zig zagged, then return to its flight path.  it did this twice.  i am attaching three pics i took of it. it was also brighter than venus in the west (for reference).
content.summary: Red sphere in the sky from the nw to the ese over my house.

content.detailedDescription: At approx 9:30 pm on 6-18-2007 my dogs started going crazy, me and my 5 year old son went outside to see why and we could see these bright lights coming towards our house from the south west fromt the desert. keep in mind i am a professional photographer, i have several still cameras and a  video camera always on the charger. these objects traveled at a impressive rate of speed, we have alot of military aircraft from mcas yuma that fly around our house, these flew faster than a helicopter but slower than a fighter jet. i was able to get photos from far away but they traveled at least 60 miles in between my digital camera resetting itself for the next photos which takes about 15 seconds. then as they got closer my camera went dead.I then went for my kodack camera which had been on the charger for 2 days, it powered on but as i tried to photograph these lights the camera shut off and the battery died. i ran and grabbbed my video camera which has been charging for 5 days and ran back out of my house , by this time the objects were over my house , my son and i could see the shapes clearly even in the darkness.They were six oval shaped objects that seemed to slow to a hover over us at i would guess 2000 ft above us. i tried to video tape them and my video camera turned on then turned off and the battery light flashed. within seconds the objects then accelerated to the martinez lake /dome area and disappeared over the hills. i have no idea if these are govt aircraft but i have never seen anything like this in my life  (3 photos in all)
content.summary: Six objects all oval in shape

content.detailedDescription: I was walking outside and just happened to look up at the moon toward the west and saw a very dark object with a cylinder shape overall.  at first i thought it might be some balloons in the sky, but they did not bob and weave like balloons i've watched float away.  it sat still for about 3-4 minutes, then began moving very slowly to the south.  it had no lights, and as it very slowly moved it seemed to also be moving up and away so that it became smaller and smaller.  i was franticly trying to get my digital camera to work, but the batteries were dead, and everytime i looked down at it, i could barely find the object again against the darkening sky.  finally it just drift completely out of sight.
content.summary: Cylinder shaped object stationary then moving slowly away and out of sight

content.detailedDescription:
at the time reported was sitting in my hottub in backyard, very dark without outside light sources, as we like to gaze while soaking.  i am very familiar with all the normal aircraft approach and departure of dia aircraft and also the usuall fly over pattern so we see the jet and general aviation all the time.  as i was simply looking straight up more in a northerly direction, (the big dipper was two the northwest as i was looking up) at the extreme of my vision being able to really discern a light, i saw a very small (or perhaps very extreme altitude distant) light traveling at least 3 times faster than the jet traffic i am accustomed to seeing traveling south to north in a straight line and constant velocity.  the sky in that area was very clear, with no discernable cloud cover. 

my first inclination was that i was seeing a sattelite passing overhead.   the movement caught my attention and i watched it for maybe two or three seconds duration when it seemed to stop, and then immediately the light intensified to at least the same size and brightness as venus, which i could identify in the west sky.  this really got my attention!  this "pulse" for lack of a better description, only lasted no more than 1 second, followed by it returning to the original observed size, continuing at more or less the same constant speed and tragectory but faded from view completely within another 1 or two seconds.

several minutes later, i saw another similar sized object more westerly, as it passed directly through the handle of the big dipper as it moved south to north, at the same apparent velocity as the first, but this object did not "pulse".  the distance between the paths were about a hand width when thumb extended up at my arms length, if that matters at all.  i am 6' even.  

is this a common sight?  i would really like to know if anyone else has seen this occur.  i will really be paying attention from now on! 

hope this report helps.  thank you.
content.summary: Watched a very small light traveling fast south to north extreme altitude no blinking discernible, suddenly brighten then fade.

content.detailedDescription:
Well, this is my second attempt at relaying this story to you since the power just inexplicably went off during my first attempt.  i have kept this sighting secret for close to forty years.  this was mainly due to fear.  i will explain this at the end.  at the time of this sighting i was a college student at the university of toledo.  it was a cold, overcast saturday night in january, 1968 (it did snow later that evening).  i was on semester break.  i and two of my fraternity brothers were on our way to a camping trip at one of the other brother's parents' cottage located in the irish hills of lower michigan.  we were headed up route 223 out of toledo, ohio and had just driven through the small town of rome center (near adrian, michigan).  i was sitting in the back seat of the car on the passanger's side when i felt a sensation of light coming from behind me.  at first i paid little attention to this thinking it was just bright car lights coming up from behind us.  however, after it happened again i paused then turned around to look out the back window of the car to discover that there was no other car on the road behind us.  puzzled, i continued to look out the back window.  then, approximately 500 feet in the clouds,  the outline of an oval shaped blue light with a similar beam of blue light came on to engulf the small town which we had just driven through! we were driving up a small incline, so it was very easy to discern the oval shape of the blue beam of light.  it was so distinct that i could clearly make out the oval edge of the beam in the darkness of the night (there were no street lights!) again, it was the most intense, beautiful blue i have ever seen!  but strangely, i could look at the light without squinting.  i cannot say enough how i was awe-struck by this beautiful blue light!  however, there was a definite on-off pattern to this light.  it reminded me of a "gigantic" flash bulb.  and, it was huge!  i would say that the size of the ufo, when closest to our car, would compare to a pineapple held out at arms length.  as i continued watching, the ufo came on again, but, this time directly over the road behind us.  it was definitely moving in a se to nw direction.  why it reminded me of a huge flash bulb is because the blue oval shape in the clouds and the beam of brilliant blue light came on at the same time but then, the beam of light would fade back into the oval shape in the clouds and then go off!  if i was a betting man, i would say that this ufo was taking pictures of the area!  now is when things start gettting a little strange.  the next time the ufo appears it is directly over our car.  i distinctly remember looking up into this light.  but, it was no longer blue but instead a very intense white light...I remember that it hurt my eyes!  the next thnig i remember is sitting down in the back seat, looking out the front window of the car and hearing the driver say "i'm gettin' the hell out of here!"  with this, the driver slammed his foot onto the gas pedal and left the area at a high rate of speed.  i caught one last glimpse of the ufo going on again approximately 1,000 yards in the distance.  now, this might seem to be a normal reaction from the driver, but, i never said a thing to anyone in the front seat about what i was observing out the back window.  yes, the driver could have become alarmed observing the ufo through his rear view mirror, but all the while i was watching this ufo, the driver and his front passanger were engaged in conversation.  and, how did the ufo move that far away from my vantage point in such a short time?  well, when we arrived at the cottage, all the lights were out and everyone was asleep!  by my watch it was past 1:00 a.M. we were not that far from the brothers cottage when i observed the ufo...Why did it take us another hour-and-a-half to arrive?  also, upon arrival, no one in the car mentioned the ufo.  to this day, it has never been discussed among us.  not too long after this my headaches began!  they have continued up until this day although they seem to be getting less severe as i age.  

what happened to me a few years later made me stay quiet regarding this ufo sighting.  i was now a teacher at a local high school in toledo.  although i lived only a couple of blocks from the school i still drove.  one morning i was backing out of the drive-way when i noticed an old-style black cadillac parked in front of my house.  i pulled away from my house and this black cadillac starts following me...Right into the parking lot of the school where i taught!  the cadillac proceeds to pull-up in the parking space right next to mine.  needless to say i was very concerned about who this person was and why they were following me.  when i looked over to see who it was, i was met by a pair of icy, glaring eyes.  to this day, i will never forget how these eyes starred right through me!  he just kept staring at me!  i say he because, i think it was a he!  he wore a white overcoat with the collar turned up all the way around his neck and mouth with a white brimed hat turned down so all that i could see were his eyes and nose (which appeared to be very thin and narrow).  the eyes reminded me of two black coals!  the skin of this guy was "whitish!" i stared back at him for a few seconds but then quickly walked into the building where i taught hoping to catch a glimpse of his license number.  mind you, i am constantly keeping the cadillac in my peripheral vision all the time i am walking to and entering the building.  on entering the building there was a door immediately to my left that i entered where the room included windows all along the side facing the parking lot from which i had just exited.  it took me less than 5 seconds to get to the window to observe this cadillac...But it was gone!  i do not know how he got out of the parking lot in such a short amount of time without me seeing him!  besides that, other cars were driving in...And this was only a "single" drive way.  he would have had to wait for the other cars to pass before he could have driven out!  as a side note here, you should know that i was getting ready to put together a complete report of my 1968 sighting prior to this visit from the black cadillac!  
also, so you know i am not some kind of nut, i hold three degrees including an industrial engineering technology degree .  as a result of what happened that evening, i have been studying the phenomenon of ufo's for years.  however, i have never come across a report similar to mine.  if one exists out there, i would certainly be interested in reading it.  also, over the years, i have come to the realization that something happened to me that night in 1968.  i do not know what.  but i have to find out!  thank you.                                

dan welch
content.summary: Town and car engulfed in intense blue beam of light

content.detailedDescription: Story attached with drawing.

content.summary: Light appered, then stopped. light show. flew 100ft directly over my head.

content.detailedDescription: Over the past couple of weeks residents of the stevens neighborhood witnessed what appeared to be small orbs of light mainly above the wells fargo skyscraper in downtown minneapolis. it started when i was out in my back alley and just happened to glance up at the night skyline. the objects were bright enough to jump out at me, but likely wouldn't have been noticed had i not at least been looking in that direction. it looked like a couple of glowing balloons, but it was the way they moved that really caught my attention. the lights would sit still for about a minute, then suddenly shoot off behind another building only to suddenly re-appear directly over the wells fargo building. the objects would zip back and forth at high speed, moving and stopping abruptly. the lights have appeared regularly each night. they seem brightest when the city lights seem brightest, but are still able to be seen after the lights downtown are turned off. birds have been ruled out due to the agility, the speed of the objects, and their apparent luminosity. it is unknown whether or not there were possible weather experiments being conducted on top of the wells fargo building during the times in question, but this also seems an unlikely explanation considering the speed and movement of the objects. there is, of course, a large international airport nearby, but this makes it that much easier to distinguish planes from other airborn craft. being a large city, minneapolis has helicopters with spotlights that occasionally circle the sky, however their appearances have been far more frequent since these objects were first noticed. there have also been loud military jets tearing directly over downtown that look as if they are coming from the airport, but only c-130s fly from that airport as far as i know. watching these things made my heart race. it was very exciting, and very beautiful in a strange way. i've tried to convince myself they were anything other than  ufos, but after a lot of thought i don't know what to think. believing they are ufos is way more fun, anyway. perhaps there is a simple explanation for these things, but it has at least one minneapolis neighborhood completely baffled! i'm sure we'll all continue to watch the skies until we find out its somebody with super-fast radio-controlled airplanes on top of a skyscraper, or something like that.
content.summary: A series of small orbs of light were seen above downtown minneapolis, zig-zagging, disappearing, re-appearing

content.detailedDescription: One night on september of "98", my cousin and i were on our way back from lansing, michigan. once we got into the village of lyons, i happend to be doing something and something had told me to look up and i noticed a white circular object moving in circles then into an oval shaped. at first i didn't think nothing of it but as i had my eyes on it, i relaized that it happend to be a ufo. at first i thought it was my eyes playing tricks on me but they weren't. i was very shocked at first then i became excited about it because it was my first time seeing one. at first, i had reason to believe that ufo's never exsisted but i was wrong. i don't have pics of it because i was about 14 years of age.
content.summary: Sept. 98......Circle/oval shaped

content.detailedDescription:
Doesnt matter what time of sundown i go outside and look. they are there. at first i figured it was satellites but as night after night of seeing them, i started realising that maybe its something a little more. ive had a about 10 instances where i would go outside and look and there will be one just over the tree line moving slowly with no sound. i do wear contacts so i can say in my defense that i cant quite make out what they are but even through binoculars is alomost impossible to tell as they alost seem to glow so much they look like stars from the sky not a 1\4 mile in the air. its fun showing others such as friends and family and seeming them see them and keep on seeing them night after night but totally blow it after awhile.

there is so much going on that its basically gotten boring to everyone around here. you can see them appear as satelites and then all of a sudden take off\disappear\stop\change direction all in one night of looking.I find it amusing when others give me the yeah right look and then i open thier eyes to the sky here in oregon.Ive seen them flash myself and my younger cousin with a camera like flash.The very night that opened my eyes to them i seen a huge flash in the sky and seen literally about 1000 of these lights all of a sudden take off in all directions.

im probably one of 1000's who feels kinda weird even talking about this but it would be nice to know what and the heck all this is. please! feel free to check the skies here in oregon.They are here.
content.summary: Not a one time thing. its every night! 100's of them in the oregon sky. nobody else sesm to notice?

content.detailedDescription: I was driving with my grandfather.  we were going to his shore house.  i was looking out the window and i saw a old house, which i always saw going to the shore house.  i saw a triangle shaped ufo about 25' above the roof.  as we drove past i lost sight of it as it went behind the trees.
content.summary: 3 lights in a triangle shape

content.detailedDescription: Already submitted but here is photo
content.summary: 2 cigar shapes captured on video

content.detailedDescription: Location: berkeley springs, wv.  on september 11, 2001, between 8 or 9 am, i was standing outside next to a fence, waiting for my mom to come back to the house from the barn (i was homeschooled at the time). i don't remember how, but somehow something in the sky caught my eye, and i was at once intrigued.  a silvery object, cigar-shaped, was traveling in a northern direction.  i'm not sure of its size, but it was clearly very high up.  i can't recall how fast it was moving...I hesitate to say that it was pretty fast.  i wouldn't have thought much of it if i hadn't noticed a faint, dull brown speck circling perfectly below it.  its orbit, if one could call it that, was very tight; the diameter of this "speck's" trajectory appeared shorter in length than the silver object it circled.  it never appeared to deviate from its course; it was as if it were attached by a string to the hull of the silver object...That's how perfectly it stayed in stride.  neither of the objects made any visible trails.  the sighting may have lasted anywhere from 30 seconds to a minute, but as the house was in the way of my view of the object i had to stand on the fence to continue watching the two objects until they disappeared behind the trees.  my younger brother saw it, too, though he remembers little.  i talked about the event excitedly until we learned of the terrorist attacks on america.  i do not believe the objects are connected with the attacks, save (perhaps) observation.
content.summary: I was outside.  saw two objects heading north; silvery cigar under which circled a brown speck.  altitude high.  unable to recall speed.  no sound or trails.

content.detailedDescription: At about 6pm on the 17th of june 2007 i was golfing in my neighbours yard when about ten people on the other side of the yard pointed out a shinny black matalic object hovering at an altitude of about 750-1000ft.  when i saw the object it was very close almost directly overhead and i could see most of its details. it had no visable openings and no contrail behind it also it didn't make a sound.  at first the object started moving to my left a picked up speed and then abrutbly turned around and went in the other direction. at this time i ran back to my house to get my camera and by the time i got back it was gone. i asked the peope who saw it were it went and they said it just vaniahed into thin air.  a couple of minutes later the police came up and asked us what we saw. also the obect appered to "wobble"at low speed but gained stablity wehen i picked up speed.
content.summary: Shiny black oject hovering overhead an altitude of about 750-1000ft.

content.detailedDescription: A friend of mine had a pic taken of himself and friends at a pool here. we can't figure out what this object is that appears in only one shot and not the second shot taken only a few seconds later. no one saw the object until we looked at the pic later on the next day. this is really confusing. we would like to be contacted about this.
content.summary: Something unidentified in photo of friends
